SELECT fi.FT_SEQ AS ft_seq, fi.FT_NAME AS ft_name, mi.MENU_NAME as menu_name, mi.MENU_INTRO as menu_intro, fr.REV_SCORE as rev_score, mi.FILE_SEVNAME as file_sevname, gt.GPS_SIDO FROM FT_INFO fi
INNER JOIN GPS_TABLE gt ON fi.GPS_SEQ = gt.GPS_SEQ
INNER JOIN (SELECT AVG(REV_POINT)*COUNT(REVIEW_SEQ) as rev_score, FT_SEQ FROM FT_REVIEW GROUP BY FT_SEQ ) fr ON fi.FT_SEQ = fr.FT_SEQ
INNER JOIN (SELECT MENU_NAME, MENU_INTRO, FILE_SEVNAME, FT_SEQ FROM (SELECT MI1.MENU_NAME, MI1.MENU_INTRO, MI1.FT_SEQ, MI1.MENU_SORT_NO, MI1.FILE_ID FROM MENU_INFO MI1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT FT_SEQ, MIN(MENU_SORT_NO) MIN_NO FROM MENU_INFO group by FT_SEQ HAVING MIN(MENU_SORT_NO) ) MI2 ON MI1.MENU_SORT_NO = MI2.MIN_NO AND MI1.FT_SEQ = MI2.FT_SEQ ) MI3 INNER JOIN IMAGE ON MI3.FILE_ID = IMAGE.FILE_ID ) mi ON fi.FT_SEQ = mi.FT_SEQ ORDER BY fr.REV_SCORE DESC

SELECT FR.REVIEW_SEQ as review_seq, FR.FT_SEQ as ft_seq, FR.USER_SEQ as user_seq, FR.REV_POINT as rev_point FROM FT_REVIEW AS FR, ( SELECT FRR2.* FROM (SELECT FR.FT_SEQ, FR.USER_SEQ, MAX(FR.REV_REGDATE) AS LATEST FROM (SELECT * FROM FT_REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_SEQ = REV_LEVEL AND USER_SEQ != #{userSeq}) AS FR GROUP BY USER_SEQ, FT_SEQ) FRR2 WHERE FRR2.USER_SEQ in (SELECT FRR.USER_SEQ FROM (SELECT FR.FT_SEQ, FR.USER_SEQ, MAX(FR.REV_REGDATE) AS LATEST FROM (SELECT * FROM FT_REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_SEQ = REV_LEVEL) AS FR GROUP BY USER_SEQ, FT_SEQ) FRR GROUP BY FRR.USER_SEQ HAVING COUNT(FRR.USER_SEQ) >= 3) ) AS SORTED WHERE FR.REV_REGDATE = SORTED.LATEST ORDER BY USER_SEQ, FT_SEQ

SELECT FR.review_seq, FR.FT_SEQ, FR.USER_SEQ, FR.REV_POINT FROM FT_REVIEW AS FR, (SELECT FR.FT_SEQ, FR.USER_SEQ, MAX(FR.REV_REGDATE) AS LATEST FROM (SELECT * FROM FT_REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_SEQ = REV_LEVEL AND USER_SEQ = #{userSeq}) AS FR GROUP BY USER_SEQ, FT_SEQ ) AS SORTED WHERE FR.REV_REGDATE = SORTED.LATEST ORDER BY FT_SEQ

SELECT SEARCH_WORD as word, COUNT(SEARCH_WORD) as freq
FROM SEARCH_TREND
GROUP BY SEARCH_WORD
ORDER BY COUNT(SEARCH_WORD) DESC
SELECT SEARCH_WORD FROM SEARCH_TREND GROUP BY SEARCH_WORD ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(ST.SWORD SEPARATOR ',') as trend_words, ST.SDATE as trend_date
FROM ( SELECT CONCAT(SEARCH_WORD, ':', COUNT(SEARCH_WORD)) AS SWORD, SUBSTR(SEARCH_DATE,1,10) AS SDATE FROM SEARCH_TREND WHERE SEARCH_WORD IN ( #{first}, #{second}, #{third} ) GROUP BY SEARCH_WORD, SUBSTR(SEARCH_DATE,1,10) ORDER BY SUBSTR(SEARCH_DATE,1,10) ) ST GROUP BY ST.SDATE
